fields.text: A unique aura available only to Lancers
Grants Damage Bonus %, Attack Speed, and Attack Rating to allies
Attack with a series of rapid thrusts using a javelin, spear or polearm
Uses the same skill as zon; can also benefit from it's synergies
Unleashes a ring of holy retribution around himself
Creates a sphere of his own blood to grant protection and a power boost
Lowers Max HP% to increase Damage Resistance %, Damage BOnus %, and Life Replenish
Travel through time and space to strike your enemies
Teleport Speed based on IAS instead of FCR
Imbue your attacks with a chance to deal deadly force to enemies
Uses the same skill as zon
